"I'll show you actions to prove I am the real Megatron," Um yells, he 
charges at Fireblade with his sword and attempts to slice him right down the 
middle.


>From: gestalt_menasor@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: My name is MEGATRON
>Date: Mon, 30 Apr 2001 01:46:25 -0000
>
>OOC: Really? I only picked him cause I thought he was the odd man out
>:) I always heard it was Skywarp, because he was more popular.
>
>
>Megatron still was paying more attention to the battle than the events
>unfolding below him. He then swiftly lifted off the ground, and landed
>beside Fireblade. "It dosent matter if I am the real Megatron or not.
>I won their loyalty by my actions not my legacy," Megatron countered.
>"But you are not the enemy" He said refering to Ultra Megatron, "And
>we are in the middle of a war," He motioned his arms for the
>Decepticons to lower their arms.
>
>
